member.name: M:routingdeal.Controllers.RoutingController.GetRoutingDeal(System.String)
member.summary: Consultar el routing de un convenio
member.remarks: Consulta el routing para el convenio de la factura solicitada
member.returns: Retorna los datos del convenio a enrutar

member.name: M:routingdeal.Controllers.RoutingController.AddRoutingDeal(routingdeal.Models.RequestDeal)

member.remarks: Registra el routing para el convenio de la factura solicitada
